Dragon Heartstring.Known characteristics: Powerful and easy to learn spells, though could easily be committed to another

Phoenix Feather.Known characteristics: Learned most varied magic, hard to be chosen

Unicorn Tail.Known characteristics: Consistent magic, bonded strongly to fist user

Kelpie Hair.Known characteristics: Easily obtainable, frequently used in the past

Thunderbird Tail Feather.Known characteristics: Powerful, but difficult to master, particularly prized by Transfigurers. Could sense danger and cast curses on their one.

Wampus Cat Hair.Used by: Johannes Jonker, Isolt Sayre, James Steward

White River Monster Spine.Known characteristics: Produced spells of force and elegance

Rougarou Hair.Known characteristics: Rumored to have had an affinity for dark magic, although suitable for use by non-dark wizards and witches as well,

Horned Serpent Horn.Known characteristics: Exceptionally powerful and sensitive to Parseltongue. Could warn its owner of danger by emitting a low musical tone

Basilisk Horn.Known characteristics: Unknown, presumably had an affinity for the Dark Arts

Curupira Hair.Known characteristics: Unstable, had an affinity for powerful yet unpredictable wizards
